mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SFM_MATCH (MATCHNUM, MATCHGENDER, MATCHPERSONNEL, MATCHPLACE, MATCHLV, MATCHKICKOFF, MATCHTIME, MATCHSTADIUM, MATCHPARKING, MATCHSUIT, MATCHSHOSE, MATCHSHOWER, MEMNUM, MEMPREFERREDAREA, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{matchnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchgender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchpersonnel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchplace, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchlv, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchkickoff, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchtime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchstadium, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchparking, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchsuit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchshose, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchshower, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mempreferredarea, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
